Text: This movie doesn't come out on blu ray till the 25th. I'll download it and rate it. If it's bad, you, my man, have a problem... In advance: Thanx...

@XyonN1980 - guessing ya don't know much about how the scene works.  Blurays are pressed and packaged long before they hit the supermarket shelves.  The scene folks know how to get hold of stuff in advance.
